title: The fact that i have to put FILL on to get a game..
body: The fact that me or some of my mates have to put fill or support on to get a game in under 10 minutes is beyond ridiculous. this shits getting so dumb, riot fix pls

replies.body: in bronze 3 that is just unlucky. I just got a game in b4 in literally 30 secs and got mid lol
Yeah i agree with all of you, just sucks we have to wait like 10 minutes for a game where i either play like a proper handicap or my team does haha.
Yeah the queue times have actually been insane lately

Problem with playing solo in bot lane is that you have to rely on luck while playing other lane replies on your own skills. In low elo, vision is not as important and people don't group like higher elo's so playing support is like playing half handicapped.

Reason why people don't play support because its one of the hardest role to master ;) 
The vision and objective control usually is thanks to the trusty support !
And also, a good support can carry the ass of your adc. 

Anyways in all seriousness, it's the way it works in OCE due to the small player base and everyone only wanting play solo lanes or jg. 
Just got to wait in queue and go watch a Youtube video while waiting man.

You can carry so easily as Support. Pick Brand, Velkox or any other high base damage AP champs as a Support and you can easily get to Gold. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cILJugr97MI

It's perfectly understandable that some positions are simply too high skill for some ;)

Seriously though I do enjoy playing support, but what I dislike about is how it's always what's left. I personally won't ever get people's desire to avoid it consistently.
